page.title: 17Preston Church, Rutland
page.content: Preston church is situated on the west side of the small village of Preston.The graveyard is encircled by a delapidated ironstone wall.There are various shrubs in the graveyard, including yew and cypress trees.The architecture of the church is very similar to that of Ridlington church.There is a steeple on the tower of the church.The ironstone of the church is covered in lichen as are the graves.The church and the graveyard is fairly well tended.The approach to the church is along a lane with cottages on either side leading to an iron gate at the entrance of the graveyard.
